description:
A couple opens a bottle of champagne. A mother tucks her kids into bed. A grandfather turns off the TV. All unaware that underneath the city, Vitalik and his crew are working 24/7 to keep the city's services functioning against threats domestic and foreign. Tune in for the 3rd SZN of this award-winning series.   
  
Meme: 1  
Season: 3  
Card: 4
